constantValues: Association between an opportunity and a product.

definitions.description: Association between an opportunity and a product.

members.name: opportunityProductId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the opportunity product.

members.description: Unique identifier of the opportunity product.

members.name: baseAmount

constantValues: Shows the total price of the opportunity product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

members.description: Shows the total price of the opportunity product, based on the price per unit, volume discount, and quantity.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Currency' adds the 'transactionCurrencyId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

value.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: baseAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Amount in base currency.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the opportunity product, such as manufacturing details.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the opportunity product, such as manufacturing details.

members.name: extendedAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due for the opportunity product, calculated on the Amount value minus the Manual Discount amount.

members.description: Shows the total amount due for the opportunity product, calculated on the Amount value minus the Manual Discount amount.

members.name: extendedAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Extended Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Extended Amount in base currency.

members.name: isPriceOverridden

constantValues: Select whether the pricing on the opportunity product reflects an override of the product catalog pricing.

members.description: Select whether the pricing on the opportunity product reflects an override of the product catalog pricing.

members.name: isProductOverridden
members.description: For system use only.

members.name: lineItemNumber

constantValues: Type the line item number for the opportunity product to easily identify the product in the opportunity documents and make sure it's listed in the correct order.

members.description: Type the line item number for the opportunity product to easily identify the product in the opportunity documents and make sure it's listed in the correct order.

members.name: manualDiscountAmount

constantValues: Type the manual discount amount for the opportunity product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total.

members.description: Type the manual discount amount for the opportunity product to deduct any negotiated or other savings from the product total.

members.name: manualDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Manual Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Manual Discount Amount in base currency.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Opportunity' adds the 'opportunityId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: opportunityId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the opportunity with which the opportunity product is associated.

value.description: Unique identifier of the opportunity with which the opportunity product is associated.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.name: opportunityStateCode_display

constantValues: Select the status of the opportunity product.

members.description: Select the status of the opportunity product.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'OpportunityProduct' adds the 'parentBundleId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: parentBundleId

constantValues: Choose the parent bundle associated with this product

value.description: Choose the parent bundle associated with this product

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'ProductAssociation' adds the 'productAssociationId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: productAssociationId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the product line item association with bundle in the opportunity

value.description: Unique identifier of the product line item association with bundle in the opportunity

members.name: productTypeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.name: productTypeCode_display

members.description: Product Type

members.name: pricePerUnit

constantValues: Shows the price per unit of the opportunity product, based on the price list specified on the parent opportunity.

members.description: Shows the price per unit of the opportunity product, based on the price list specified on the parent opportunity.

members.name: pricePerUnitBase

constantValues: Value of the Price Per Unit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Price Per Unit in base currency.

members.name: pricingErrorCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'pricingErrorCode_display' is added to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'pricingErrorCode'
arguments.name: pricingErrorCode_display

constantValues: Select the pricing error for the opportunity product.

members.description: Select the pricing error for the opportunity product.

members.name: productDescription

constantValues: Type a detailed product description or additional notes about the opportunity product, such as talking points or product updates, that will assist the sales team when they discuss the product with the customer.

members.description: Type a detailed product description or additional notes about the opportunity product, such as talking points or product updates, that will assist the sales team when they discuss the product with the customer.

members.name: productName

constantValues: Calculated field that will be populated by name and description of the product.

members.description: Calculated field that will be populated by name and description of the product.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Product' adds the 'productId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: productId

constantValues: Choose the product to include on the opportunity to link the product's pricing and other information to the opportunity.

value.description: Choose the product to include on the opportunity to link the product's pricing and other information to the opportunity.

members.name: quantity

constantValues: Type the amount or quantity of the product the customer would like to purchase.

members.description: Type the amount or quantity of the product the customer would like to purchase.

members.name: tax

constantValues: Type the tax amount to be applied on the opportunity product.

members.description: Type the tax amount to be applied on the opportunity product.

members.name: taxBase

constantValues: Value of the Tax in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Tax in base currency.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Unit' adds the 'uoMId' attribute below to the 'OpportunityProduct' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: uoMId

constantValues: Choose the unit of measurement for the base unit quantity for this purchase, such as each or dozen.

value.description: Choose the unit of measurement for the base unit quantity for this purchase, such as each or dozen.

members.name: volumeDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the discount amount per unit if a specified volume is purchased. Configure volume discounts in the Product Catalog in the Settings area.

members.description: Shows the discount amount per unit if a specified volume is purchased. Configure volume discounts in the Product Catalog in the Settings area.

members.name: volumeDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Volume Discount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Volume Discount in base currency.

members.name: sequenceNumber

constantValues: Shows the ID of the data that maintains the sequence.

members.description: Shows the ID of the data that maintains the sequence.
